short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An browser web extension which add templating generic answer support to app store reviews website including Google Play Store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add response template for App Store reviews, including Google Play Store & Apple App Store (not affiliated). 

Allow 2 level of tree, import & export data, and should be synced to your chrome/firefox account if the data stored are not too big.
